Now more than ever, it is important that we have up-to-date contact information. Even if your information has not changed, you will need to confirm your contact information.

These are challenging times, and we care about the welfare of you and your family. If your family is in need of resources, please complete the survey sent out by your building principal on April 15th. #HarrisburgStrong #InThisTogether
How are our Tigers making the most of their day? ğŸ¾Message us a picture by the end of the day and we'll share them tomorrow. #WhatchaDoinWednesday

There will be some changes to the Grab & Go meals over the next couple of weeks.Â During that time, we will transition some items served over to heat-and-eat products such as breakfast sandwiches, cheese omelets, chicken nuggets, hamburgers, chicken sandwiches and popcorn chicken.Â All of these items can be heated in the microwave and instructions are on a small label that has been placed in the bag.Â We will continue to have Uncrustables peanut butter and jelly sandwiches as a daily option in addition to the heat and heat lunch items.
